text.11_Daf, 100_Line: The whole entire world was not created except to join to this one / l’tsavot l’zeh.
text.11_Daf, 96_Line: The Holy One said: The whole entire world was not created except for the sake of this one / bish’vil zeh.
text.11_Daf, 92_Line: Every person that has fear/awe of the heavens, his words are heard, as it is said,
text.11_Daf, 94_Line: What is [the meaning of], “for this/zeh is the whole human”?...
text.11_Daf, 93_Line: “The end of the word/matter/davar, everything is (has been) heard, fear Ha’elohim [and keep His commandments, for this is the whole human]” [Ec 12:13]
text.11_Daf, 98_Line: This one is equal to the whole world.
